languages.text: "Правду-матку режет господин навигатор. Как пить дать — на этой станции просто куча голосочков-шепоточков, и все прорваться сюда норовят с той стороны, только руку протяни да дверку им открой".

traits.locale_text: "Правду-матку режет господин Навигатор. Как пить дать — на этой станции просто куча голосочков-шепоточков, и все прорваться сюда норовят с той стороны, только руку протяни да дверку им открой".

languages.text: "The Lord Navigator here is speaking the unvarnished truth. I bet this station is full of voices and whispers, all trying to break through from the other side, waiting for you to reach out and swing the door open wide."
languages.original_text: "Правду-матку режет господин навигатор. Как пить дать — на этой станции просто куча голосочков-шепоточков, и все прорваться сюда норовят с той стороны, только руку протяни да дверку им открой".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Navigator is speaking straight from the shoulder. I bet this station is full of voices and whispers, all trying to break through from the other side, waiting for you to reach out and swing the door open wide."

"Lord Navigator is speaking straight from the shoulder. I bet this station is full of voices and whispers, all trying to break through from the other side, waiting for you to reach out and swing the door open wide."

"The Lord Navigator speaks the unvarnished truth. I bet this station is full of voices and whispers, all trying to break through from the other side, waiting for you to reach out and swing the door open wide."

"The Lord Navigator here is speaking the unvarnished truth. I bet this station is full of voices and whispers, all trying to break through from the other side, waiting for you to reach out and swing the door open wide."

"The Lord Navigator here is speaking the unvarnished truth. I bet this station is full of voices and whispers, all trying to break through from the other side, waiting for you to reach out and swing the door open wide."

"The Lord Navigator here is speaking the unvarnished truth. I bet this station is full of voices and whispers, all trying to break through from the other side, waiting for you to reach out and swing the door open wide."

languages.text: «Lo que dice el Lord Navegante es nada más y nada menos que la verdad. Apuesto a que en esta estación hay voces y susurros deseosos de acceder desde el otro lado, esperando que extiendas la mano para cruzar».
languages.original_text: "The Lord Navigator here is speaking the unvarnished truth. I bet this station is full of voices and whispers, all trying to break through from the other side, waiting for you to reach out and swing the door open wide."

traits.locale_text: «Lo que dice el Lord Navegante es nada más y nada menos que la verdad. Apuesto a que en esta estación hay voces y susurros deseosos de acceder desde el otro lado, esperando que extiendas la mano para cruzar».

languages.text: "Der Lord Navigator spricht die reine Wahrheit. Ich wette, diese Station ist voller Stimmen und Geflüster, die alle versuchen, von der anderen Seite durchzubrechen. Die nur darauf warten, dass Ihr die Hand ausstreckt und die Tür weit öffnet."
languages.original_text: "The Lord Navigator here is speaking the unvarnished truth. I bet this station is full of voices and whispers, all trying to break through from the other side, waiting for you to reach out and swing the door open wide."

traits.locale_text: "Der Lord Navigator spricht die reine Wahrheit. Ich wette, diese Station ist voller Stimmen und Geflüster, die alle versuchen, von der anderen Seite durchzubrechen. Die nur darauf warten, dass Ihr die Hand ausstreckt und die Tür weit öffnet."

languages.text: « Le seigneur navigateur dit vrai, malheureusement. Je suis sûre que cette station est remplie de voix et de murmures, qui cherchent tous à s'infiltrer depuis l'autre côté, attendant que vous tendiez le bras pour leur ouvrir grand la porte. »
languages.original_text: "The Lord Navigator here is speaking the unvarnished truth. I bet this station is full of voices and whispers, all trying to break through from the other side, waiting for you to reach out and swing the door open wide."

traits.locale_text: « Le seigneur navigateur dit vrai, malheureusement. Je suis sûre que cette station est remplie de voix et de murmures, qui cherchent tous à s'infiltrer depuis l'autre côté, attendant que vous tendiez le bras pour leur ouvrir grand la porte. »

languages.text: “这位导航者说的话是不折不扣的事实。我敢打赌，这座星站里一定充斥着各种声音和耳语，打算从另一个世界里闯过来。他们都在等待你伸出援手，大开门户。”
languages.original_text: "The Lord Navigator here is speaking the unvarnished truth. I bet this station is full of voices and whispers, all trying to break through from the other side, waiting for you to reach out and swing the door open wide."

traits.locale_text: “这位导航者说的话是不折不扣的事实。我敢打赌，这座星站里一定充斥着各种声音和耳语，打算从另一个世界里闯过来。他们都在等待你伸出援手，大开门户。”

languages.text: 「航宙士殿は、ありのままの真実を語っているわ。きっとこのステーションのあちこちらでする囁き声が、向こう側から通り抜けようとしていて、あなたが手を差し伸べて、ドアを思い切り開くのを待っているのよ」
languages.original_text: "The Lord Navigator here is speaking the unvarnished truth. I bet this station is full of voices and whispers, all trying to break through from the other side, waiting for you to reach out and swing the door open wide."

traits.locale_text: 「航宙士殿は、ありのままの真実を語っているわ。きっとこのステーションのあちこちらでする囁き声が、向こう側から突破しようとしていて、あなたが手を差し伸べて、ドアを思い切り開くのを待っているのよ」
「航宙士殿は、ありのままの真実を語っているわ。きっとこのステーションのあちこちらでする囁き声が、向こう側から通り抜けようとしていて、あなたが手を差し伸べて、ドアを思い切り開くのを待っているのよ」

languages.text: "Lord Rotacı'nın sözleri gerçeği tüm çıplaklığıyla yansıtıyor. Bu istasyon, kesin ses ve fısıltı kaynıyordur. Hepsi öte taraftan buraya geçmeye çalışıyordur. Biri gelip kapıyı ardına kadar açsın diye bekliyorlardır."
languages.original_text: "The Lord Navigator here is speaking the unvarnished truth. I bet this station is full of voices and whispers, all trying to break through from the other side, waiting for you to reach out and swing the door open wide."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Rotacı'nın sözleri gerçeği tüm çıplaklığıyla yansıtıyor. Bu istasyon, kesin ses ve fısıltı kaynıyordur. Hepsi öte taraftan buraya geçmeye çalışıyordur. Biri gelip kapıyı ardına kadar açsın diye bekliyorlardır."
